title: cultural_data_MZTV_Museum_of_Television
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.toursphere.mztv.
Application Name: MZTV Museum of Television.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: From Liberty Village in heart of Toronto, Ontario, Canada, the MZTV Museum of Televisionexhibits the world’s most comprehensive collection of television receivers for the formative fifty- year period from the 1920s to the 1970s.Together with related original papers, discs, books, magazines, toys and other ephemera, the collection offers over 10,000 objects to scholars, students, and the general public, to tell the story of the medium and understand its impact on the people who watch it.Download the MZTV Museum app for a personalized tour when you visit our gallery.This app is powered by OnCell, an official mobile provider for MZTV Museum of Television & ArchiveRead moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 686.00.
Overall Rate: 0.00.
First Page Reviews: A very good resource for the museum.  Allows you to delve deeper into the museum information.  Too bad most museums are not offering similar applications.
Number of Characters in First Page Reviews: 153.00.
